briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety of Azilsartan Medoxomil Plus Chlorthalidone in Participants With Moderate to Severe Hypertension
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Double-Blind, Randomized, Efficacy and Safety Study Comparing the TAK-491 Plus Chlorthalidone Fixed-Dose Combination vs Benicar HCT® (Olmesartan Medoxomil-Hydrochlorothiazide) in Subjects With Moderate to Severe Essential Hypertension

arms.label: Azilsartan Medoxomil 20-40mg plus Chlorthalidone 12.5-25 mg QD
Azilsartan Medoxomil 40-80mg plus Chlorthalidone 12.5-25 mg QD

summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the efficacy and safety of azilsartan medoxomil combined with chlorthalidone, once daily (QD), in participants with moderate to severe essential hypertension.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline to Week 8 in Trough, Sitting, Clinic Systolic Blood Pressure.

effectByArm.arm: Azilsartan Medoxomil 20-40mg Plus Chlorthalidone 12.5-25 mg QD
Azilsartan Medoxomil 40-80mg Plus Chlorthalidone 12.5-25 mg QD
